comments.body: This may look a bit hacky, but it was necessary to do this because the configure file provided was [broken](https://travis-ci.org/conda-forge/staged-recipes/jobs/117061287#L578) and the first pass of `autoconf` was not enough. Without the `-i`, `autoreconf` [fails to recognize](https://travis-ci.org/conda-forge/staged-recipes/jobs/117061901#L296) one of the dependencies is going to built later.
